mysql.name: select_memberid_t_member
mysql.sql: select id from t_member t where t.NICK_NAME = '%(phone)s';

mysql.name: select_itemid_t_item
mysql.sql: select ID from t_item i where i.TITLE = '%(itemID)s';
mysql.desc: 通过商品名称查询商品ID

mysql.name: select_activitidid_t_raffle
mysql.sql: select ID from t_raffle r where r.TITLE = '%(activitiesId)s';
mysql.desc: 通过活动名称查询活动ID
